title: Was the Chinese bird scientist Dr. Li-Ming Yan saying COVID-19 was made in the Wuhan lab?
subtitle: It is not the first time that a controversial doctor has made such allegations about the origin of the global epidemic.
author: Madison Dapcevich
vclaim: In September 2020, Dr. Lee-Ming Yan, a post-doctoral former student at the University of Hong Kong, appeared in multiple television interviews claiming to have evidence that Sars-Ku V-2, a virus that causes COVID-19, was manufactured by the Chinese Communist Party at the Wuhan Laboratory.
